item.name: Home
item.description: Roasted Brussels sprouts are like popcorn to me, only they taste better, are way healthier for you, and don’t require a visit to the dentist afterwards. There’s really no magic to roasted Brussels sprouts, either. You just clean ‘em up, toss some olive oil and seasoning on them, and throw them into the scorching oven […]
